headline: CON EDISON DECLARES COMMON STOCK DIVIDEND
summary: NEW YORK - Consolidated Edison, Inc. declared a quarterly dividend of 85 cents a share on its common stock, payable June 16, 2025 to stockholders of record as of May 14, 2025.Consolidated Edison,...
